data.name: Getting to know HR: Recruiting Coordinator Albe

data.message: everyone always thinks that Groupon has "good deals" until one day they get SCREWED over!! My friend bought a $90 value for Unlimited Tanning minutes thinking it was a fair deal. When she went to the tanning salon there was a new owner who was not accepting the groupon coupon. She called Groupon 3 times and waited on hold for 20 minutes each time and everytime they answer the phone they quickly hang up on her!!!!!! She has emailed Groupon about their poor customer service and that she just needs someone to help her and she has received no reply. THEY ARE A SCAM!!! I will be telling everyone I know about Groupon to make sure they do not receive honest customers like us!!! I will also be posting about their screwed up service on my timeline!

Hey Marlene, if your friend is still having trouble contacting customer service, please have her message the details to us. Customer support is pretty backed up with tickets from the holidays but we'll do the best we can to help her out. Thanks!

data.name: Groupon Holiday Party 2012

data.message: Unfortunately without The Hoff.
They have Holiday work parties in Europe, too.
data.description:
Hunderte Kolleginnen und Kollegen aus Deutschland, Österreich und der Schweiz kamen zusammen für einen Rückblick auf 2012 und um ein weiteres aufregendes Jahr in der Geschichte von Groupon zu feiern. Die Berliner Universal Hall, eine ehemalige Pumpstation aus den 1880er Jahren, war die pefekte Location dafür. Komplett in blau und natürlich grün ausgeleuchtet wurde hier die Nacht zum Tag gemacht, nachdem auf dem extra aufgebauten Weihnachtsmarkt traditionelle Köstlichkeiten für Stärkung sorgten. 

Hundreds of colleagues from all over Germany, Austria and Switzerland met to look back at 2012 and celebrate another exciting year in the history of Groupon. Berlins Universal Hall, a former pump station built in the 1880s, was the perfect venue for that. Colored all in blue and the inevitable green danced away the nigth after having traditional snacks at the outside christmas market.

Just made it a rule at Groupon to come to work either A) casual or B) super corporate-3 ties and 2 blueteeth (bluetooths?) required.
;) Love it. That apply for the women too?! Sounds so creative there!!
Of course! Women need to have at least 4 skirts and some kind of brooch.

Excellent! I'm all in...4 skirts in hand and I'll wear an assortment of brooches on the days I'm not in capris and flip flops. :) Now if my French Bulldog can occasionally ride along on sales calls, we are off and running! My current customers have a love affair with him at times and he dresses equally well in casual or corporate.

From Groupon Chicago :
Wow. Just a bit ago we sold our 20 millionth Groupon. Thank you. Our science says 20 million hot dogs would feed the moon 5 times.
Amount paid

I am giving 6 as gifts. I count it as the value of the Groupon. It makes my gift seem that much more awesome-er. :)  I've had to limit my spending this year but still want to people give nice gifts. Groupons allow me to be baller, without actually having to play like Derek Rose. Thank you!!
